alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 10:14PM CDT until June 07 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mitchell County in north central Kansas... Southern Jewell County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Smith County in north central Kansas... Eastern Osborne County in north central Kansas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1014 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Formoso to Gaylord, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Formoso and Randall around 1020 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Osborne, Scottsville, Simpson, Tipton and Hunter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
